sections.text:
77-213.Recreational Trail Easement Property Tax Exemption Act, how cited.

Sections 77-213 to 77-218 shall be known and may be cited as the Recreational Trail Easement Property Tax Exemption Act.

SourceLaws 2025, LB647, ยง 1.Operative Date: January 1, 2026

sections.heading: 77-213 to 77-218 shall be known and may be cited as the Recreational Trail Easement Property Tax Exemption Act.
